posts.description: If we’re asked to look forward a few years into the future, we tend to project a version that is consistent with the current world but only about 20-30% better. If we want to create a new world, we must reverse that direction and, instead, imagine ourselves in the future state looking backward. This is referred to as “backcasting”, which is different from forecasting in that you start with the end in mind and “cast” backwards.
